name: Korred
damage_resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks

special_abilities.name: Command Hair.
descriptions: The korred has at least one 50-foot-long rope woven out of its hair. As a bonus action, the korred commands one such rope within 30 feet of it to move up to 20 feet and entangle a Large or smaller creature that the korred can see. The target must succeed on a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw or become grappled by the rope (escape DC 13). Until this grapple ends. the target is restrained. The korred can use a bonus action to release the target, which is also freed if the korred dies or becomes incapacitated.

>A rope of korred hair has AC 20 and 20 hit points. It regains 1 hit point at the start of each of the korred's turns while it has at least 1 hit point and the korred is alive. If the rope drops to 0 hit points, it is destroyed.

special_abilities.name: Innate Spellcasting.
descriptions: The korred's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (save DC 13). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:

descriptions.raw: At will: commune with nature, meld into stone, stone shape
descriptions.hyperlinked: At will: commune with nature, meld into stone, stone shape

descriptions.raw: 1/day each: conjure elemental (as 6th-level spell; galeb duhr, gargoyle, earth elemental, or xorn only), Otto's irresistible dance
descriptions.hyperlinked: 1/day each: conjure elemental (as 6th-level spell; galeb duhr, gargoyle, earth elemental, or xorn only), Otto's irresistible dance

special_abilities.name: Stone Camouflage.
descriptions: The korred has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in rocky terrain.

special_abilities.name: Stone's Strength.
descriptions: While on the ground, the korred deals 2 extra dice of damage with any weapon attack (included in its attacks).

actions.name: Multiattack.
descriptions: The korred makes two attacks with its greatclub or hurls two rocks.

actions.name: Greatclub.
descriptions: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (1d8+6) bludgeoning damage, or 19 (3d8+6) bludgeoning damage if the korred is on the ground.

actions.name: Rock.
descriptions: Ranged Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, range 60/120 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (2d8+6) bludgeoning damage, or 24 (4d8+6) bludgeoning damage if the korred is on the ground.
